channel.title: CVE Feed for Meta Platforms, Inc -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Meta Platforms, Inc -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-50050|2024-10-24T18:26:22.699Z -- meta%20platforms%2C%20inc -- llama%20stack
item.description: Llama Stack prior to revision 7a8aa775e5a267cf8660d83140011a0b7f91e005 used pickle as a serialization format for socket communication, potentially allowing for remote code execution. Socket communication has been changed to use JSON instead.

item.title: CVE-2024-50050|2024-10-23T13:35:17.320Z -- meta%20platforms%2C%20inc -- llama%20stack
item.description: Llama Stack prior to revision 7a8aa775e5a267cf8660d83140011a0b7f91e005 used pickle as a serialization format for socket communication, potentially allowing for remote code execution. Socket communication has been changed to use JSON instead.
